about_the_game:
AstroMole is a 2D Platformer Collectathon where you play as a Mole with a Jetpack that can Fly through space, Land on Planets and dig up treasure in randomised levels. Explore Black Holes filled with strange creatures, treacherous obstacles and valuable jewels hidden differently each time you play!

become Astromole!

Play as Cris, a Jetpack wielding Mole on a mission to explore the unknown! Use her abilities to fly through space, land on Planets and excavate them for Treasures aplenty!

randomised Levels!

Explore cosmic spaces whose contents are distorted each time you enter. Planets, enemies, challenges and most importantly treasure locations will be different, offering a new experience every time!

collect All the Treasure!

Find all manner of valuables as you dive into Black Holes created by the Cosmic Anomaly. Every Gem and Jewel will help you travel further into them and discover more!

challenges Galore!

Complete a huge variety of challenges peppered throughout the Cosmic Anomaly’s Black Holes that will test your skills as an AstroMole. Overcoming challenges will reward you with Aster Jewels, the most valuable treasure of all and the key to unlocking deeper depths of the Anomaly.

mole Upgrades!

Take collected Gems, Star Stones and Blueprints to Condy, Cris’ sister and resident Mole Mechanic. She’ll use them to upgrade Cris’ equipment and abilities, as well as decipher Blueprints to learn new Mole Moves. Learning these will help Cris explore further into the black holes and find more Treasure!
